item.title: I made this tonight
item.description: Instead of going clubbing i made this wite with my friend jeffrey: WhoTheHeck.com sign up and make it go. I tired to make it nice and ajaxy. i used rails - of course. I had a problem in the beginning cuz my rails was fuxored up due to me not upgrading properly and what not. stupid gem. it fixed itself. smart gem. gnight
